title: @riot What am I supposed to do when this happens, and how can I try and get this person in trouble?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I hopped into a ranked game and I was in champ select, when the first thing I see is someone saying that they are going to intentionally feed. The person then starts arguing with someone from a previous game, saying that he is going to intentionally feed to reduce stress and that the other person deserves this. I was unable to report this normally, as someone dodged because he locked in teemo jungle with cleanse and barrier.

replies.body: Submit a ticket but don't expect a response after that.
Why you want to get people in trouble?

> [{quoted}](name=ShinkoMinori,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImLgsyrX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-30T15:32:12.759+0000)
>
> Why you want to get people in trouble?

Look above
Until you get an inter in your last promo game.
